newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: VNU ACQUIRES FRENCH PC MAGAZINE PUBLISHER.
newsitem.headline: VNU ACQUIRES FRENCH PC MAGAZINE PUBLISHER.

text.p: Dutch publisher NV Verenigd Bezit VNU said on Thursday it had agreed to buy the remaining 82 percent of the shares in French computer magazines publisher Excelsior Informatique from Excelsior Publications SA.
The Dutch group has held 18 percent of the shares in Excelsior Informatique since 1991.
VNU said Excelsior Informatique was France's leading magazine publisher for the personal computer market with its monthly titles Science & Vie Micro (SVM) and SVM Macintosh.
It said Excelsior Informatique had annual sales of some 140 million French francs.
VNU said it was already market leader in the computer magazines markets in Britain, the Netherlands and Belgium and had substantial market shares in Italy and Spain.
